content.rendered:
Emmanuel Lanzmann, Global Head of Quantitative Modeling and Technology, says working at Millennium offers both the scale of a global investment firm twinned with the energy and excitement of a start-up.

Learn more about our technology teams

excerpt.rendered: Emmanuel Lanzmann, Global Head of Quantitative Modeling and Technology, says working at Millennium offers both the scale of a global investment firm twinned with the energy and excitement of a start-up.
